channel.title: Heart rate issue
channel.description: Whenever i smoke some weed my heart rate increases allot and i find it really anoying.Last time i thought i was getting a heart attack cause it was beating really really fast. Is this normal or maybe it was bad quality weed?

item.title: Heart rate issue
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

[quote=“0uch a arr0w, post:7, topic:106445”][quote author=Gotta Catch Them All link=topic=152396.msg1437989#msg1437989 date=1181093524]

Whenever i smoke some weed my heart rate increases allot and i find it really anoying.Last time i thought i was getting a heart attack cause it was beating really really fast.
Is this normal or maybe it was bad quality weed?

Just try ignoring it and once you forget to notice your heart beating fast it will probably stop.

But then again, you have to make sacrifices to get high.
[/quote] XD Ignoring it?[/quote]

Yeah, ignoring it. If you think about it, its less likely to stop and if you are worrying about it, its even less likely to stop than thinking about it.

Read full topic

item.title: Heart rate issue
item.dc:creator: @0uch_a_arr0w 0uch a arr0w
item.description:
@0uch_a_arr0w wrote:

[quote=“Gotta Catch Them All, post:3, topic:106445”][quote author=Tribal link=topic=152396.msg1437669#msg1437669 date=1181089761]
Whenever i smoke some weed my heart rate increases allot and i find it really anoying.Last time i thought i was getting a heart attack cause it was beating really really fast.
Is this normal or maybe it was bad quality weed?

[/quote]

Just try ignoring it and once you forget to notice your heart beating fast it will probably stop.

But then again, you have to make sacrifices to get high. :P[/quote] XD Ignoring it?

Read full topic

item.title: Heart rate issue
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

[quote=“Tribal, post:5, topic:106445”][quote author=goatee link=topic=152396.msg1437993#msg1437993 date=1181093575]
I kind of like it getting faster… i get more excited.
[/quote]
you like it? i fucking hate it. everytime i smoke and i want to sit down and relax a bit i feel like my heart is going to pop out of my chest.
It just ruins everything[/quote]

Heart rate does increase when you smoke weed, but almost certainly not to the point where it’s going to cause problems. You are experiencing anxiety, worrying about it is making it worse. Distract yourself with something tasty to eat or fun to do.

Read full topic

It’s the weed, try to be relaxed when your doing it and with friends. I’ve never really had it but I got it once when I was new to it because I heard a police car.
